sentence: We don't agree with what Liz Cheney is doing.? Ms. Hageman said she didn't know who the legitimate winner of the 2020 election was (I don't know the answer?) and couldn't say if former Vice President Mike Pence had the authority to block congressional certification of President Biden's election (I'm not an elections attorney?).
title: Where's Liz Cheney? The Wyoming Republican's Exile From Wyoming Republicans
